name: Catgirl Chainsaw Massacre
description:
(´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡ Made for the sweet to sour game jam 2023 ♡ (´｡• ᵕ •｡`) 

A cute story about a girl and her sister living in a small village. 
What mischief will they get up to next? Find out!!

Made in renpy ;)


A short read (because we all have commitment issues sometimes)!
(And also because I joined the game jam way too late)

CONTENT WARNINGS:
Detailed gore, death
